examples.example: 只要我们不断努力，梦想就一定会起飞。

translate.english: As long as we keep working hard, the dream will definitely take off.

examples.example: 我们的事业正处在上升期，即将起飞，迈向更高的辉煌。

translate.english: Our cause is in the rising period, about to take off and move towards greater glory.

examples.example: 经过多年的筹备，他的创业项目终于顺利起飞。

translate.english: After years of preparation, his entrepreneurial project finally took off smoothly.
